name: Vertical Web
tagline: LET US GIVE YOU A LIFT
description:
A Digital Marketing Agency based in Nashville TN. Vertical Web LLC is a company dedicated to helping its clients become more visible and attractive online. We integrate brilliant custom website design with several distinct digital marketing strategies for each individual client.
Our services include Custom Website Design, Search Engine Optimisation (SEO), Blog Setup/Integration/Managment, Content Marketing, Enewsletters, Social Media Customization & Strategy, Online Video Production and Integration across all mediums, Google Adwords Pay-Per-Click Setup/Management.
